app.title: Question generator app - i18n for UI Kit
app.description: A question generator app built using UI Kit to demonstrate i18n support in Forge [en-US]

text.intro: You can use the following question to build your next ice-breaker activity.

question.q_0: What's the best thing you've crossed off your bucket list? [en-US]
question.q_1: If you could only read one book for the rest of your life, what would it be? [en-US]
question.q_5: What's an underrated kitchen appliance or gadget? [en-US]
question.q_7: What's your favorite room in your house? [en-US]
question.q_8: What's the best vacation you've ever been on? [en-US]
question.q_11: What toppings are on your ideal pizza? [en-US]
question.q_12: What song makes you feel the most nostalgic? [en-US]
question.q_14: What song is most likely to get you on the dance floor? [en-US]
question.q_15: What format was the first album you purchased? (Cassette, CD, digital) [en-US]
question.q_16: What smell reminds you most of a specific place or time? [en-US]
question.q_17: Do you have a lucky number? What is it, and why? [en-US]
question.q_18: What's your favorite type of cuisine? [en-US]
question.q_19: What's your favorite way to eat potatoes? [en-US]
question.q_20: If you could have an unlimited supply of one thing, what would it be? [en-US]
question.q_22: What would your personal theme song or walk-on song be? [en-US]
question.q_25: Who would your 12-year-old self say is their biggest hero? [en-US]
question.q_26: What's an unexpected life lesson you've learned? [en-US]
question.q_27: After people and pets, what's the first thing you'd rescue if (god forbid!) your home was on fire? [en-US]
question.q_30: If you had to live in a different country for a year, which one would you choose? [en-US]
question.q_31: What's your hottest take or most surprising opinion? [en-US]
question.q_32: Would you want to know how much time you have left to live? [en-US]
question.q_33: What's a surprising “fun fact” about you? [en-US]
question.q_34: If you had to teach a class or give a TED Talk, what would it be about? [en-US]
question.q_35: What one day in your life would you most like to relive? [en-US]
question.q_36: What's a cause or charity that means a lot to you? [en-US]
question.q_37: What's your favorite way to spend a day off? [en-US]
question.q_38: How would your loved ones describe you in five words? [en-US]
question.q_40: When was the last time you felt inspired to create something? [en-US]
question.q_41: What's one of your nicknames and how did you get it? [en-US]
question.q_42: What's the best compliment you've ever received? [en-US]
question.q_43: What character traits do you admire? [en-US]
question.q_44: What trait are you most proud of in yourself? [en-US]
question.q_45: If you could master any skill immediately, what would it be? [en-US]
question.q_46: What would you title your memoir? [en-US]
question.q_47: What's a habit you're trying to break or build? [en-US]
question.q_48: Would you rather travel to the past or the future? [en-US]
question.q_49: What's the biggest misconception people have about you? [en-US]
question.q_51: If you could switch lives with someone for a day, who would you choose? [en-US]
question.q_52: What's one thing you've always wanted to try but haven't yet? [en-US]
question.q_53: What advice would you give to your younger self? [en-US]
